channel.title: [PI] help! my character file wont save into the folder characters!
channel.description: exactly what title sais! and i even deleted the whole thing and then remade it. and it fricken was same as i left on other so like this say i got to varrock i logged out deleted server and client re made then i log in and still am in varrock just how i left on other i think there account might be saved somewhere else? and its getting it from there? idk help!??!?! its the nividia server 317 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,492527.0.html heard another feller at last page having same problem. and some one said just log out to get your character saved to folder. and i did it and notin.
